parameters.responseBody:
={
  "success": true,
  "workflowId": "{{ $('Process Video Data').item.json.workflowId }}",
  "processedAt": "{{ $('Process Video Data').item.json.processedAt }}",
  "title": "{{ $json.title }}",
  "accountName": "{{ $json.accountName }}",
  "instagramPostId": "{{ $json.id }}",
  "message": "Video posted to Instagram successfully!"
}
